content.rendered:
Wear the crown
to rule them all

Wear the crown to rule them all

Enter the world of Savage Tale, an NFT based rogue-like dungeon crawler where you must build and train a team of creatures to send on a perilous journey to conquer the Savage Tower with the ultimate prize being the legendary Savage Crown.

In a kingdom far far away…

At the center of the Kingdom lies the Savage Tower. Within the Savage Tower lives the Savage King. A  top the Savage King’s head sits the Savage Crown.

The Savage Crown contains ultimate power and governance over all the Kingdom. Warriors from every land across the Kingdom make their journey to the Savage Tower to take on the challenge to become the next Savage King.

What lies within the tower is only known by those who have entered it and the lucky few who have lived to exit it. Standing for a millennia, no creature knows where the Savage Tower came from, it has always just been. A symbol of mystery living in the backdrop of every village across the Kingdom.

Creatures

Five distinct lands converge around the mysterious Savage Tower. Each land, steeped in its own unique history, has given rise to its own breed of creatures. They are not just animals but warriors molded by the harsh realities of their homelands.

Each creature is equipped with an arsenal of weapons and armor that reflect their homeland’s essence. From flame-forged broad swords, to armor piecing javelins, their gear is as unique and diverse as the creatures themselves.

Training

Send your creatures on exciting quests, earning Savage Tokens along the way. Use these tokens to upgrade your gear and prepare for even bigger adventures. Whether it’s enhancing your armor or sharpening your weapons, each quest brings a chance to grow stronger, as they prepare to face the ultimate challenge, The Savage Tower.

Savage Tower

Savage Tower

Locked for over 1000 years, no creature truly knows what happened to the Savage King who lived there. Myths of immortality and unimaginable wealth for those who have conquered the tower have been passed down for generations, but the truth seems to have been locked away for good. Until one day, the giant tower doors have opened and an invitation from the Savage King is sent to all who dare accept the challenge to take the Savage Crown.
